Plot: Charlie Smith (Jack Nicholson) recently married, works as a US Border Patrol agent while his wife (Valerie Perrine) compulsively spends his money to lead an extravagant lifestyle above their means. After Charlie is recruited by corrupt coworkers that are on the take he is now faced with serious ethical concerns dealing with human smuggling, kid napping and murder.

Starring: Jack Nickolson, Harvey Keitel, Valerie Perrine, Warren Oates, Elpidia Carrillo and Shannon Wilcox
